description.message: Effortlessly block and redirect websites with customisable rules to stay focused and productive.

paragraph.message: To block a resource, enter part of its name in the left input field, without including the protocol. For example, entering "facebook" will block all subdomains of that website. In the right input field, enter the full URL for redirection, including the protocol, such as "https://google.com". Then click the Save button. If the redirect URL is left blank, the target site will simply be blocked. To change a rule, delete the old one and create a new entry.

blockurlonlyascii.message: Only ASCII characters are allowed in the block URL

donatespantext.message: Enjoying this extension? Help support its development!
